## Instructor

![](images/team/mine.png){style="float:right;padding: 0 0 0 10px;" fig-alt="Headshot of Dr. Mine Çetinkaya-Rundel" width="200"}

[**Dr. Mine Çetinkaya-Rundel**](http://mine-cr.com/) (she/her) is Professor of the Practice and Director of Undergraduate Studies at the [Department of Statistical Science](https://stat.duke.edu/) at Duke University and an affiliated faculty in the [Computational Media, Arts, and Cultures](https://cmac.duke.edu/). Mine's work focuses on innovation in statistics and data science pedagogy, with an emphasis on computing, reproducible research, student-centered learning, and open-source education as well as pedagogical approaches for enhancing retention of women and under-represented minorities in STEM.
